notes.text:
Make extra - it always disappears fast
Add mozzarella for cheesy garlic bread
Perfect alongside pasta or soup

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by preheating the oven to 200°C. It'll be nice and toasty for our garlic bread!

steps.descr: Mix butter with garlic, parsley, Parmesan, and salt

on_enter.say: Now, let's mix the softened butter with garlic, parsley, Parmesan, and a pinch of salt. Give it a good stir until everything's well combined.

steps.instructions: Mix butter with garlic, parsley, Parmesan, and salt

steps.descr: Slice baguette diagonally, not cutting all the way through

on_enter.say: Grab your baguette and slice it diagonally, but be careful not to cut all the way through. We want to keep it together for the magic to happen!

steps.instructions: Slice baguette diagonally, not cutting all the way through

on_enter.say: Time to get that lovely garlic butter into the baguette. Spread it generously between each slice. This is where the flavor magic happens!
Let's wrap our buttered baguette in foil. This will keep all those delicious flavors locked in while it bakes.
Pop the foil-wrapped baguette into the oven and let it bake for 15 minutes. Your kitchen will soon smell amazing!

steps.descr: Open foil for last 5 minutes to crisp

on_enter.say: Now, carefully open the foil and let the bread crisp up for the last 5 minutes. It'll give us that perfect crunch!

steps.instructions: Open foil for last 5 minutes to crisp

recipe.title: Garlic Bread
recipe.description: Crispy, buttery bread loaded with garlic and herbs
